languages.text: {n}Паскаль берет долгую паузу, нарушаемую лишь нервным треском {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}.{/n} "Данное утверждение ложно. Я, Паскаль Ханейманн, в полной мере принимаю ответственность за свои греховные деяния и предательство доверия моего почтенного наставника".

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль берет долгую паузу, нарушаемую лишь нервным треском {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}. Наконец он произносит:{/n} "Данное утверждение ложно. Я, Паскаль Ханейманн, в полной мере принимаю ответственность за свои греховные деяния и предательство доверия моего почтенного наставника".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль берет долгую паузу, нарушаемую лишь нервным треском {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}.{/n} "Данное утверждение ложно. Я, Паскаль Ханейманн, в полной мере принимаю ответственность за свои греховные деяния и предательство доверия моего почтенного наставника".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. At last he says:{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pascal Haneumann, fully accept the responsibility for my sinful acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal hace una larga pausa, interrumpida únicamente por los nerviosos chasquidos de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}.{/n} «Esa afirmación es errónea. Yo, Pasqal Haneumann, acepto plenamente la responsabilidad por mis actos profanos y por traicionar la confianza de mi estimado mentor».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal hace una larga pausa, interrumpida únicamente por los nerviosos chasquidos de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}.{/n} «Esa afirmación es errónea. Yo, Pasqal Haneumann, acepto plenamente la responsabilidad por mis actos profanos y por traicionar la confianza de mi estimado mentor».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルはしばらく黙り込む。その{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から、神経質な雑音が漏れてくる。{/n}「その主張は誤りです。自分、パスカル・ヘニュマンは、自分の冒涜的な行為と尊敬する指導者の信頼を裏切ったことの責任を全面的に受け入れます」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはしばらく黙り込む。その{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から、神経質な雑音が漏れてくる。{/n}「その主張は誤りです。自分、パスカル・ヘニュマンは、自分の冒涜的な行為と尊敬する指導者の信頼を裏切ったことの責任を全面的に受け入れます」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡停顿了很长时间，你只能听到他的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}发出了紧张的噼啪声。{/n}“这种说法是错误的。我，帕斯卡·哈努曼，犯下了亵渎之举，辜负了我尊敬的导师的信任，我愿为此承担全部责任。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡停顿了很长时间，你只能听到他的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}发出了紧张的噼啪声。{/n}“这种说法是错误的。我，帕斯卡·哈努曼，犯下了亵渎之举，辜负了我尊敬的导师的信任，我愿为此承担全部责任。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal marque une longue pause uniquement interrompue par le grésillement nerveux de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Cette affirmation est erronée. Moi, Pasqal Haneumann, j'accepte pleinement la responsabilité de mes agissements profanes et de la trahison de la confiance de mon estimé mentor. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal marque une longue pause uniquement interrompue par le grésillement nerveux de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Cette affirmation est erronée. Moi, Pasqal Haneumann, j'accepte pleinement la responsabilité de mes agissements profanes et de la trahison de la confiance de mon estimé mentor. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal macht eine lange Pause, die nur vom nervösen Knistern seines {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} durchbrochen wird.{/n} "Diese Aussage ist falsch. Ich, Pasqal Haneumann akzeptiere die volle Verantwortung für meine profanen Taten und meinen Verrat am Vertrauen meines ehrwürdigen Mentors."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."

Ich, Pasqal Haneumann akzeptiere die volle Verantwortung für meine profanen Taten und meinen Verrat am Vertrauen meines ehrwürdigen Mentors."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his vox.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} çıkan gergin bir tıkırtı haricinde uzunca bir süre ses çıkarmıyor.{/n} "Bu önerme yanlış. Ben ki Pasqal Haneumann, din dışı eylemlerimin ve değerli yönderimin güvenine ihanet etmiş olmamın tüm sorumluluğunu kabul etmekteyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal takes a long pause, broken only by the nervous crackle of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "This statement is false. I, Pasqal Haneumann, fully accept responsibility for my profane acts and betraying the trust of my esteemed mentor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}undan çıkan gergin bir tıkırtı haricinde uzunca bir süre ses çıkarmıyor.{/n} "Bu önerme yanlış. Ben, Pasqal Haneumann, din dışı eylemlerimin ve değerli yönderimin güvenine ihanet etmiş olmamın tüm sorumluluğunu kabul etmekteyim."
